author: David Ng, David Ng
title: Sarah Silverman Joins Democrats Using Coronavirus to Push 'Vote at Home' Initiative
description: Actress-comedian and left-wing activist Sarah Silverman is the latest celebrity to lend her social media influencer power to a vote-at-home initiative, which is being launched in the midst of the worldwide coronavirus pandemic.
content: Actress-comedian and left-wing activist Sarah Silverman is the latest celebrity to lend her social media influencer power to a vote-at-home initiative, which is being launched in the midst of the worldwide coronavirus pandemic. The effort is intended to press… [+2279 chars]
